data.title: IT Coordinator
data.tasks: Managing infrastructure, guiding cross-functional teams, and driving innovation to enhance operational efficiency and stakeholder outcomes.

data.title: IT Consultant
data.tasks: Business analysis and development of tailored solutions, with a focus on CRM development and integrations to streamline business processes.

data.title: Information Systems Manager
data.tasks: Management of Marketing and IT teams, plan and implement new systems, foster collaboration across teams, stakeholders, and external partners.
